author: claytoniousfunk
body:
#### PR description:

  - This PR adds a vertex smearing for 2023 PbPb MC. 
  - Beamspot position derived from run 374719, barycentre location provided by Tracker Alignment Group ([cmsTalk](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/pix-barycentre-values-for-heavy-ion-runs/31353))

#### PR validation:

  - This PR has been modeled after a similar PR from 2022: [PR link](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40496)

@boundino @mandrenguyen
title: Vertex smearing for PbPb MC based on 2023 PbPb data
